short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Saner.ai seamlessly captures, organizes information and generates insights, thus freeing up your time to focus on what's matter.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We believe that information capturing should be fast & convenient. These beliefs have driven us to develop features such as:
- Capture directly via a side panel note that follows you across the web
- Take notes using keyboard shortcuts or with just two clicks
- Quickly label notes with Auto-tag functionality
- Easily show/hide notes to maintain focus flow
- All notes are automatically stored in the Inbox of Saner.ai.
